description.value: At 2nd level, the cavalier can spend a standard action to extol his own accomplishments and battle prowess. He receives @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{Dazzling Display} as a bonus feat. He does not need a weapon in hand to use this ability. The cavalier receives a +2 morale bonus on melee attack rolls made against demoralized targets.
